## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_038919C]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The pyd2-1 mutant has a wild-type appearance under normal growth conditions. Pyrimidine nucleotide and uridine levels are not changed in the mutant, but uracil levels are increased. The mutant has about a 75% decrease in uracil catabolism. These mutants cannot grow normally when uracil is provided as a sole nitrogen source.
   - [pyd2-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;The pyd2-2 mutant has a wild-type appearance under normal growth conditions. Pyrimidine nucleotide and uridine levels are not changed in the mutant, but uracil levels are increased. These mutants cannot grow normally when uracil is provided as a sole nitrogen source.
